name: Flanking Tactics (beta)
description:
Flanking Tactics (beta)

Grab a Friend and Flank Them!

Flanking Tactics is a focused little local two-player tactics game. Think chess, but with only three different pieces, multiple actions per turn, ranged attacks, and Flanking!

Offense is the best defense. But take care not only where you put your units, but also where they are facing! Frontal attacks will drain all of the attacking unit's moves, whereas attacks to the side or back will not!

Pay attention, or get Flanked!

Available for Windows and macOS.

Please note: This game is essentially finished. It does not have any music or sound, and to restart, you have to restart the app. Since this project was intended as an exercise for me, i will most probably not continue developing it, except maybe if there is real demand.
